text.last_approved_text: This is your spy's satisfaction within their target faction, rather than towards your own. If driven to dissatisfaction, they might abandon their mission and return home; if they become too satisfied, they risk forgetting their loyalties and defecting!

text.last_approved_text: Your active spies will help build your undercover network over time.\n\nThis web of contacts and other covert assets will support your insidious ambitions, but may be unexpectedly challenged by a faction's own covert defences; be prepared!

text.last_approved_text: Abandoning your spy will cause them to join their target faction; they will no longer serve your faction's interests.\n\nAre you sure you want to abandon your spy?

text.last_approved_text: Your spy must be a commandery administrator before they can engage in settlement spy activity.\n\nConsistent loyal service may lead to their being granted authority over a commandery...

agent_localisations.text: Your spy must be a commandery administrator before they can engage in settlement spy activity.\n\nConsistent loyal service may lead to their being granted authority over a commandery...

text.last_approved_text: Your spy must be a member of the ruling family before they can engage in family subterfuge.\n\nTime will tell if they are worthy of being adopted by the faction leader...

text.last_approved_text: Your spy must be a general in an army before they can engage in military spy activity. \n\nIn time, they are sure to be called upon to serve in the field...

agent_localisations.text: Your spy must be a general in an army before they can engage in military spy activity. \n\nIn time, they are sure to be called upon to serve in the field...

text.last_approved_text: Your spy must be recruited into their target faction before they can engage in court intrigue and other spy activity.\n\nRecruitment is never guaranteed, but a capable-seeming candidate will present a more appealing recruitment prospect! Until then, your spy will scout the target faction's lands, reporting back as they go.

agent_localisations.text: Your spy must be recruited into their target faction before they can engage in court intrigue and other spy activity.\n\nRecruitment is never guaranteed, but a capable-seeming candidate will present a more appealing recruitment prospect!
